name: The International Association of Independent Tanker Owners
membership: INTERTANKO together with BIMCO, INTERCARGO and The International Chamber of Shipping/the International Shipping Federation form the Round Table of International Shipping Associations.
goal: INTERTANKO has been the voice of independent tanker owners since 1970.  It is a professional association representing an industry dedicated to delivering reliable, safe, responsible and competitive service transporting the liquid energy and chemicals that keep the world economy running.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Energy, Environment, Foreign affairs and security policy, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Transport
euInitiatives:
EU Sulphur Directive
Places of Refuge
PRF Directive
NIS Directive
MRV Regulation
NEC Directive
Maritime Security
Digitalisation
